user_query: [Music] I love the smell of toner in the morning Thomas Popper is a divorced father consumed by his career you don't want to disappoint them when did I ever disappoint [Music] anybody until one day Thomas your father sent you a souvenir where was he and Antarctica he receives an extraordinary gift he sent me a live penguin when Popper's penguin is joined by five more what the his personal and professional life is turned upside down I don't like you I don't need you I don't want you in my life F to get a look at the star make that six little stars that made this one memorable movie making experience action when the Penguins got to set they sure had a lot to learn these penguins have not been in any other projects this is their first role which makes it [Music] interesting yeah Pippi Mr Popper I'm not coming in to work again today I have a pest problem good thing you have such a nice fridge had a nice fridge like all actors on the road to Hollywood Fame they had to start with the basics like getting into character do they have names this one's Loudy Lovey Stinky Bitey Nimrod and Captain and that that was just the beginning a penguin's favorite reward is fish okay don't crowd me don't crowd me I just roll around in fish and they would follow me around place is coming together huh or apart with so much attention from the cast and crew they quickly got comfortable living the good life sometimes they got a little too comfortable on set of course in the end they didn't let all that
